statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, article_id, rating FROM feedback_comments WHERE article_id = 10;
SELECT comment, rating FROM feedback_comments WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback_comments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM feedback_comments WHERE article_id = 5 AND rating <= 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_comments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, article_id, rating FROM feedback_comments WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, article_id, rating FROM feedback_comments WHERE user_id = 2 AND rating < 4;
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating FROM feedback_comments WHERE article_id = 5 AND rating >= 2 ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, article_id, rating FROM feedback_comments WHERE article_id IN (3, 7, 9) ORDER BY article_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_articles WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT article_title, rating FROM knowledge_articles INNER JOIN user_feedback ON knowledge_articles.article_id = user_feedback.article_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_articles WHERE created_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 2 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, date_submitted FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT article_title, article_content, date_created FROM KnowledgeArticles WHERE author_id = 456;
SELECT comment_text, date_posted FROM UserComments WHERE article_id = 789 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT article_title, author_id FROM KnowledgeArticles ORDER BY author_id ASC, date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, article_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT article_id, article_title, author_id FROM KnowledgeArticles WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserComments ORDER BY comment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, author_id, article_content FROM KnowledgeArticles WHERE author_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, MAX(date_submitted) AS latest_feedback_date FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, rating_value FROM user_ratings WHERE article_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, article_id FROM user_feedback
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_articles
SELECT user_id, article_id, comment_text FROM user_comments
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating_value FROM user_ratings
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, article_id, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT article_id, title, category FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT comment_id, user_id, article_id, timestamp FROM comments WHERE article_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating_given FROM ratings ORDER BY user_id ASC, article_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT article_id, content, category FROM articles WHERE category IN ('Technology', 'Science', 'Art') ORDER BY article_id;
SELECT comment_id, user_id, article_id, comment FROM comments WHERE comment LIKE '%awesome%' OR comment LIKE '%excellent%';
